alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 12:49PM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of between 5 and 10 inches at lower elevations and 10 to 20 inches in the mountains, are possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Helena Valley, Meagher County Valleys, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet roads may quickly freeze and become extremely slippery late Friday afternoon as colder air surges south and snow continues.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Northwest Beaverhead County
